Rocky Balboa.action: Rocky rubs his bare shoulders nervously as he approaches the security guards.

Rocky Balboa.action: Rocky Balboa is described as a fifty-to-one underdog with a record of forty-four wins, twenty losses, and thirty-eight knockouts.

Rocky Balboa.action: Rocky is entering the ring amid a highly charged atmosphere with many people wishing him well and others insulting him.

Rocky Balboa.action: Blocks eighty percent of Apollo Creed's jabs with his face despite being slower and considered an amateur by Creed.

Rocky Balboa.action: Explodes with an upswing hook to the jaw, knocking down the undefeated champion Apollo Creed.
